alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains; Orofino, Grangeville Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 2:42PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Clearwater County through 245 PM PDT... At 142 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pierce, or 19 miles east of Orofino, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pierce, Headquarters, Cardiff and Jaype. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Orofino, Grangeville Region
